```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

## Do something simple

```{r}
x_vec= rnorm(30, mean=5, sd=3)

(x_vec-mean(x_vec))/sd(x_vec)

```

I want a function to compute z-scores

```{r}

z_scores= function(x) {
  
  z=(x-mean(x))/ sd(x)
  
  return (z)
  
z_scores(x_vec)
}
```

Try my function on some other things

```{r}
z_scores(3)

z_scores("my name is Jeff")

z_scores (mtcars)

z_scores(c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE))
```
